name: Post bootcamp spot ungraded homework as Github issues
description: Will grab homework from the bootcampspot api, and add them to a github repository as issues

EMAIL.description: The email for your bootcamp spot account.

PASSWORD.description: The password to your bootcamp spot account.

COURSE_ID.description: The course id you are enrolled it, you can get this from the /api/instructor/v1/me endpoint

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access Token from github with admin:org, repo, user, possibly less

REPOSITORY.description: Github repository you want to post the issues to

ASSIGNEE_CHOICES.description: List of Github usernames separated by commas
